alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:52AM EST until January 09 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a coating to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will overspread the area in the predawn Tuesday. A wintry mix is expected through the morning before a changeover to rain by afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
